trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of auditory stimulus that is presented

Levels.presentation_story: presentation of a short story, just listen
Levels.question_story: question relative to a short story, just listen
Levels.response_story: response relative to a short story, push correct button
Levels.presentation_math: presentation of a math problem, just listen
Levels.question_math: question relative to a math problem, just listen
Levels.response_math: response relative to a math problem, push correct button

stim_file.Description: Path and name of the wav file used

ntrial.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus in seconds

stim_file_question1.LongName: First auditory stimulus presented as question
stim_file_question1.Description: Path and name of the wav file used as first part of the question

stim_file_question2.LongName: Second auditory stimulus presented as question
stim_file_question2.Description: Path and name of the wav file used as second part of the question

question_option1.Description: First part of the two-alternative forced-choice question

question_option2.Description: Second part of the two-alternative forced-choice question

onset_that_was_about.LongName: Onset of the beginning of the question
onset_that_was_about.Description: Onset of the beginning of the two-alternative forced-choice question

onset_question_option1.Description: Onset of the first option of the two-alternative forced-choice question

onset_question_option2.Description: Onset of the second option of the two-alternative forced-choice question

response_time.Description: Time taken to provide the answer
